0111100001101011 0001010101011011 0 -> sum: 1000110111000110, cout: 0
1001111100010100 0001111100111011 0 -> sum: 1011111001001111, cout: 0
1111000111000000 0000100010101001 0 -> sum: 1111101001101001, cout: 0
1110000000101010 0010101001000100 0 -> sum: 0000101001101110, cout: 1
1101001111011000 0001100101110000 0 -> sum: 1110110101001000, cout: 0
0110011101110010 1001100100000101 0 -> sum: 0000000001110111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
